cv: "Pablo Reichert 2260 Arbor Court Wheatland, WY 82201 Tel# (123)345-7890 E-mail: Buck01@tl.net Objective : Experienced IT Assistant Manager looking for position with reputable organization. Supported Office personnel on corporate applications. Created and executed proper backup and disaster recovery procedures. Managed IT within the regionally approved budget. Maintained baseline of IT security standard and policies. Provided IT solution and costing for RFP/RFQ submissions and system upgrades.
